name: ConvertShapeOptions
shortdesc: Options for indicating the type of shape to which to covert an object.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_RECTANGLE
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to a rectangle.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_ROUNDED_RECTANGLE
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to a rectangle with rounded corners.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_BEVELED_RECTANGLE
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to a rectangle with beveled corners.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_INVERSE_ROUNDED_RECTANGLE
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to a rectangle with inverse rounded corners.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_OVAL
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to an ellipse.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_TRIANGLE
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to a triangle.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_POLYGON
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to a polygon.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_LINE
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to a line that connects the upper left and lower right corners of the object's bounding box.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_STRAIGHT_LINE
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to straight line. If the object is a square, circle, or its bounding box is wider than it is tall, the line is horizontal and connects the center points on the vertical sides of the bounding box. If the object's bounding box is taller than it is wide, the line connects the center points of the horizontal sides of the bounding box.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_OPEN_PATH
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to an open path.

property.name: CONVERT_TO_CLOSED_PATH
property.shortdesc: Converts the object to a closed path.
